channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Magic Eden to refund users after 25 fake NFTs sold due to exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Over two dozen fake NFTs were sold on the Magic Eden marketplace over a 24-hour period due to a "massive exploit" on the platform.

item.title: SEC files objection to Binance.US’s plans to acquire Voyager Digital
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The SEC wants to see more information included in the $1.022 billion deal between Binance’s U.S. arm and Voyager Digital before it agrees to the acquisition.

item.title: US authorities are seizing $460M in Robinhood shares tied to FTX: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Officials reportedly told a bankruptcy judge they were in the process of seizing 56 million shares of Robinhood tied to FTX and its former CEO, Sam Bankman-Fried.

item.title: Bonk token goes bonkers as traders chase after high yields in the Solana ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: Traders are piling into BONK, boosting its price by triple-digits in the last 24 hours and possibly hinting at a trend reversal in Solana price.

item.title: Celebs who got burned endorsing crypto and those that got away with it
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Screen actors and sports stars copped most of the backlash for 2022’s crypto endorsements, while soccer legends appear to have gotten away with it.

item.title: Judge rules Celsius owns funds in Earn accounts, paving the way for stablecoin sale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Judge Martin Glenn found the terms of use for the Earn program “unambiguous,” and besides that, treating account holders as unsecured creditors was more equitable.

item.title: NFT influencer falls victim to cyberattack, loses $300K+ CryptoPunks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.category: The allegedly stolen loot included items from the Cryptopunks
item.description: They appear to have authorized a malicious DApp to transfer their tokens, leading the assets to be drained immediately.

item.title: LG Electronics’ latest partnership seeks to bring interoperable metaverse platforms to TVs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The partnership hopes to bring the metaverse directly into the living rooms of viewers.

item.title: Genesis tells clients it needs more time on financial woes after Gemini demands action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Genesis interim CEO Derar Islim has sent a second letter to clients to say the crypto lender is working on its liquidity issues resulting from the FTX collapse, but they’re not there yet.

item.title: US Congress investigations into FTX are in limbo without a House Speaker
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: With no leadership elected to the House of Representatives, efforts to address fraud allegations at FTX or legislate crypto may be delayed indefinitely.

item.title: Cake DeFi publishes Merkle tree-based proof of reserves
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to Cake DeFi, users can now verify both assets and liabilities through its website.

item.title: The worst influencer and celebrity NFT cash grabs of 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: From Donald Trump’s trading cards to Tai Lopez’s peculiar NFT collection, 2022 marked another year of poorly thought-out NFT drops by big names.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: The crypto market is up today, reflecting market participants’ expectations that inflation is cooling after positive economic data.

item.title: Magic Eden hosting service compromised: Nifty Newsletter, Dec 28–Jan 3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The wallet address of RTFKT’s chief operating officer got drained of its NFTs through a phishing scam.

item.title: Digital assets inflows reached $433M in 2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Bitcoin and multi-asset investment products saw inflows amounting to $287 million and $209 million last year, according to a report from CoinShares.

item.title: Crypto regulation world: How laws for digital assets changed in 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: While regulations were once seen as hurdles to crypto adoption, they are now perceived as the fastest way to attain global mainstream adoption.

item.title: Price analysis 1/4: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT, LTC, UNI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins are showing signs of starting a sustained recovery over the next few days.

item.title: MEXC launches $20M ecosystem fund to support Sei Network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: A layer 1 blockchain designed for trading, Sei Network previously raised $5 million in funding in August.

item.title: How time-weighted average price can reduce the market impact of large trades
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: Time-weighted average price is an algorithmic trading strategy that aims to reduce price volatility and improve liquidity during the trading process.

item.title: $16.8K Bitcoin now trades further below this key trendline than ever
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action is now deeper below its 200-week moving average than at any point in its history.

item.title: Web3 projects aim to create engagement between fans and sports leagues
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Sports leagues are showing interest in DAOs, NFTs and the metaverse, but challenges may hamper adoption.

item.title: Coinbase agrees to $100M settlement with NY regulator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Regulators reported that the crypto exchange had a backlog of 100,000 alerts about potentially suspicious customer transactions.

item.title: Here’s how Bitcoin promotes global financial inclusion, according to Prince Philip of Serbia
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Prince Philip of Serbia outlines key ways in which Bitcoin promotes global financial inclusion and its importance in conflict-affected nations.

item.title: Hackers steal $3.5M worth of digital assets from GMX whale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The hackers took control of 82,519 GMX tokens and exchanged the assets for 2,627 Ether, and then transferred the assets to the Ethereum network using Hop Protocol and Across Protocol.

item.title: UK looks for a crypto crime fighter willing to accept a $50K salary
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The United Kingdom’s top crime agency is looking to hire a crypto investigator with experience of identifying and recovering seed phrases.

item.title: Year of Bitcoin miners’ merge? Analysts predict key mining trends for 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Public Bitcoin miners will actively work to minimize costs in 2023 by going private or merging with other firms, Hash Rate Index analysts predicted.

item.title: Israeli securities regulator moves to establish crypto legal framework
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: After tasking multiple committees over the years, the Israeli Authority is ready for public comment on its proposal of crypto legal framework

item.title: Bitcoin analyst identifies new key levels as Ethereum price nears 3-week high
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Fresh Bitcoin support and resistance levels crystalize amid an “extremely tight” trading range while ETH price action sets multi-week highs.

item.title: DeFi auditor nets $40,000 for identifying Uniswap vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: A security firm flagged a now-fixed vulnerability to Uniswap, highlighting the potential for reentrancy attacks on the protocol’s Universal Router smart contract.

item.title: Nifty News: Solana NFT trading volume, Nike RTFKT COO hacked and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Twitch streamer and NFT project founder DNP3 admitted in a Twitter post that he gambled and lost investor funds.
